queue.description: Queue priority configuration for crawl orchestration

adaptive-seed.description: URLs discovered by intelligent planning and adaptive hub detection

gap-prediction.description: URLs predicted to fill coverage gaps based on problem clustering

country-hub-discovery.description: Country hub pages predicted by gazetteer-aware reasoning - TOTAL PRIORITY

country-hub-article.description: Article links discovered on country hub pages - HIGH PRIORITY

sitemap.description: URLs from structured sitemaps (reduced priority for country hub focus)

hub-validated.description: Hub pages validated by previous crawls (reduced for country focus)

link.description: Regular link discovery from page parsing (lowest priority)

article.description: Article content pages (highest priority - lowest weight)

hub-seed.description: Hub pages seeded by intelligent planner

refresh.description: Known URLs being refreshed/updated (lowest priority - highest weight)
